about-me.name: About
about-me.presentation: HelloðŸ‘‹ I am 24 years old and a full-stack JavaScript developer. After earning my bachelor's degree in electronic and computer systems, I chose to specialize in web development. I now have nearly two years of experience as a full-stack JavaScript developer!

overcraft.name: Overcraft
overcraft.description: Overcraft is a platform where StarCraft 2 players can create, organize, and share their build orders to better learn and optimize their strategies. It offers an interactive mode with a timer to execute builds in real time, along with customization and editing options.

web-cv.name: Web CV
web-cv.description: I wanted to create a unique website combining my resume, portfolio, and a way to contact me.

island-ship.name: Island Ship
island-ship.description: My first tower defense game, developed with the Godot engine in C#.

universite-cote-d-azur-ulysseus.name: UniversitÃ© CÃ´te d'Azur - Ulysseus
universite-cote-d-azur-ulysseus.description: System updates, development and maintenance of applications for the Ulysseus alliance of institutions.

match-4-cooperation.name: Match 4 Cooperation
match-4-cooperation.description: Ulysseus Match 4 Cooperation is a mobile app aimed at bringing together the Ulysseus research community. It allows researchers to exchange about their work, collaborate on European project calls, and find mobility opportunities.

developed-features.1: Redesign of the group creation system via the Mastodon API, reducing creation time from over an hour to just a few seconds by implementing a status system during the process. This system also tracks progress and informs the user.
developed-features.2: Use of the Mastodon API to display followers and followings on the user's profile.
developed-features.3: Improvement of the user search system.
developed-features.4: Enhancement of the overall UI of the application.
developed-features.5: Publication on Google and Apple stores.

invenio-rdm.name: Invenio RDM
invenio-rdm.description: InvenioRDM is an open-source platform developed by CERN for managing and sharing research data, offering advanced features for depositing, searching, and preserving scientific data. I participated in the InvenioRDM partner community meeting held in MÃ¼nster, Germany, from March 18 to 22, 2024. https://inveniosoftware.org/blog/2024-04-23-april-project-meeting-update

developed-features.1: Redesign of the main page displaying universities of the Ulysseus alliance, with a button redirecting to publications by researchers from the selected university.
developed-features.2: Improvement of native search (limited to publications) via the search bar, now also showing profiles and organizations referencing the entered name.
developed-features.3: Merging an external application (form and data on researchers and their expertise domains) with full integration into InvenioRDM.

airflow.name: AirFlow
airflow.description: Development of an automated monitoring system (PINGER) using AirFlow to check the availability of our web applications and track the validity of SSL certificates on our various domains.

developed-features.1: Creation of a `pinger` script running every 5 minutes to check the availability of all services. In case of downtime, an email is sent with the detected error reason.
developed-features.2: Development of a script to check SSL certificates of domain names, sending reminders starting 15 days before expiration.

student-portal.name: Student Portal
student-portal.description: Development of a centralized student portal to display events and activities organized across different campuses, facilitating information access and student participation.

developed-features.1: Application developed from scratch: initialization of frontend, backend repositories and deployment.
developed-features.2: Deployment and production launch of the complete application on a subpath of the Ulysseus domain.

microsoft-azure.name: Microsoft - Azure
microsoft-azure.description: Automation of the process to add new users to the Ulysseus tenant via a Python script, easing access management and user integration.

developed-features.1: Improvement of the user account creation script on the Ulysseus Microsoft Azure tenant.
developed-features.2: Creation of a script to synchronize distribution lists from a given Excel file: adding and removing members and owners of the alias.

servers-details.name: Servers Details
servers-details.description: Automation of retrieving detailed server information, including performance, status, and configuration data, then generating an Excel report for easy tracking and quick analysis.

developed-features.1: Retrieval of information from each server, including installed Docker version and versions of Docker images used.

licence.name: Bachelor's Degree in Embedded Systems
licence.description: Programming languages: C / C++ and VHDL (PIC16, ARDUINO, STM32). Real-time OS with FreeRTOS. Linux and Windows operating systems.

bts.name: BTS Digital Systems
bts.description: Study of schematics, design and troubleshooting on electronic boards, signal analysis, Arduino programming, HTML/CSS.
